class TinyCRClient¶

Public Functions

TinyCRClient(std::string serverIP)¶

Constructor for TinyCRClient

Parameters

  • serverIP: The hostname of the server

bool startClient()¶

Start client, get request from server and listen to updates.

bool queryCertificate(const K &key)¶

Query a certificate

Return

bool indicating if the key is revoked or unrevoked

Parameters

  • key: Key, which should be queried

double getLatencyStatistic(std::string statistic)¶

Get statistic with the name of the statistic

Return

The value of the statistic

Parameters

  • statistic: The name of the statistic

template<typename K, class V>
class TinyCRServer¶

Public Functions

TinyCRServer(int port, vector<K> positive_keys, vector<K> negative_keys)¶

Constructor for TinyCRServer

Parameters

  • port: The port that the server should run on

  • positive_keys: The list of unrevoked keys.

  • negative_keys: The list of revoked keys.

void startServer()¶

Starts tiny CR server. Send delta updates on changes, monitor port for new devices and start a socket server for communication from the Certificate Authority.

bool addCertificate(pair<K, V> kv)¶

Adds a new certificate, value 1 corresponds to valid certificate and 0 to invalid

Return

Status of adding the certificate.

Parameters

  • kv: Key value pair of the key that should be added and the value it should hold

bool removeCertificate(K k)¶

Removes and existing certificate NOT IMPLEMENTED

Return

Status of removing the certificate.

Parameters

  • k: The key that should be removed.

bool unrevokeCertificate(K k)¶

Unrevoke an existing certificate

Return

Status of unrevoking the certificate.

Parameters

  • k: Key that should be unrevoked.

bool revokeCertificate(K k)¶

Revoke and existing certificate

Return

Status of revoking the certificate.

Parameters

  • k: Key that should be revoked.

double getLatencyStatistic(std::string statistic)¶

Average latnecy of a successful DASS update.

Return

The value of the statistic

Parameters

  • statistic: The name of the statistic
